Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Chicago. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Chicago.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays at Jefferson Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays at Jefferson Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
